description:
Designed to compliment their award winning Glidepath shorts, these pants give you options when you’re just not feeling shorts. Great for shoulder season riding, yet light enough to wear year-round, the Glidepath pants use a burly nylon blend to protect you from spring showers and summer mosquitoes.

  • Stretchy nylon blend has a DWR finish to keep you safe from the elements (think water resistant, not waterproof)
  • Looped backing helps wick away moisture
  • Paneled construction moves and stretches with you
  • Plenty of pockets with 2 hand pockets and 2 deep, zippered side pockets that are easy to access when in the saddle
  • Low-profile locking waist adjusters let you fine tune the fit
  • Reinforced knees leave room for light knee pads
  • Stretchy cuffs keep the cold and the trail chunder from creeping in
  • Trim fit leaves room for layering but won’t get caught in your drivetrain
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Glidepath Pants - Men's
